short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A straightforward cursor animation that activates each time a new tab is opened.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Explore the web with a straightforward cursor animation that follows your movements each time you open a new tab!
By clicking “Add to Chrome”, you accept and agree to install the Following Dots extension, set the Chrome™ New Tab to Following Dots, and to the Terms of Use, and Privacy Policy.
Please note that the extension will change your default search provider to Microsoft Bing.
Privacy Policy: https://inkwork.net/privacy-policy-1
Terms Of Use: https://inkwork.net/terms-and-conditions
Get in touch: https://inkwork.net/contact
Learn more: https://inkwork.net/about
